duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and coordinate care for patients, from pre-admission through post-discharge, by working collaboratively with the multidisciplinary team.
Ensure that patients are assigned the appropriate care, receive the appropriate services, and are transitioned to the appropriate post-discharge care.
Perform accurate, timely, and effective discharge planning for patients.
Work with third party payers to ensure coverage, and coordinate education and prevention programs.

education_certification.credential: Associate's Degree in Nursing required. New ASN RNs hired after January 1, 2013, will be required to complete their BSN within 5 years of hire date. Requires current state of Indiana license as a Registered Nurse. Certification in Case Management preferred.
